definition: position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: Only then is a diploma issued by the ministry of higher education .
sentences.chinese: 只有在那時高教部才簽發學位證書。

sentences.english: He obtained a diploma in architecture.
sentences.chinese: 他獲得了建築學的學位證書。

sentences.english: Did you get a degree in journalism?
sentences.chinese: 您有新聞學的學位證書嗎？

sentences.english: The International Baccalaureate gives access to the entrance examinations to all faculties and colleges.
sentences.chinese: 擁有國際學位證書就有機會進入各個大學和學院。

sentences.english: Be sure to include what kind of degree or certificate you’ll need to land those jobs.
sentences.chinese: 要確保列出得到這些工作所必須的學位證書。

sentences.english: Non-academic abroad or outside the honorary title or degree certificate.
sentences.chinese: 非學術性國外或境外榮譽稱號或學位證書。

definition: credit system/grading system (in schools, universities etc)

pinyin: gong1 shang1 guan3 li3 shuo4 shi4

definition: Ruyuan Yao Autonomous County in Shaoguan 韶關|韶关[Shao2 guan1], Guangdong

pinyin: Guang3 dong1 Wai4 yu3 Wai4 mao4 Da4 xue2
Bei3 jing1 Di4 er4 Wai4 guo2 yu3 Xue2 yuan4
